title: ALL STAR DIANA SKIN
body:
after 4 months all star the diana skin still in pbe yet how long we have to wait for that 
shut up and make it  and take my money {{champion:131}}

replies.body: it hasnt been on the PBE yet.

We haven't announced a date for this lady to make her debut, but she'll be out a bit later this year. That said, while it was chosen via All Star/player votes, it's just going to be a cool fire-themed skin, not an esports skin. ^-^
what will the price will be
Hasn't been decided upon, she's still in concept.
it has to be 1350 value new recall animation and all other stuff but 750 price cuz all esport skin is 750{{champion:131}} {{summoner:31}}
She's not going to be an esports skin. ^-^ Also, not all esports skins are 750 RP. SSW Thresh was 975.
it is ?  idk  i though its 750    oh god i want to buy it in the first place but now  NOPE  too expensive{{item:3070}} {{champion:412}} {{item:3070}}

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=VA7fY1L1,comment-id=000000020000,timestamp=2016-02-12T20:24:15.153+0000)
>
> Hasn't been decided upon, she's still in concept.

Well she needs an epic 1350 Skin that actual show effects and not just color changes! LEGGO RITO!
For the amount good quality fire effects that are expected of it, probably 1350.
What do you mean by later this year? Are we talking like summer or are we talking not until 2016 worlds?
A bit later, to me, means... August. Effing hell. Omfg.
Let's hope it's 975. I'll be pissed if it is any more than that.
